item.title: Alchemist is wrong
item.content:encoded:
Quote from wikidot page on alchemist 5th level ability: "At 5th level, you develop masterful command of magical chemicals, enhancing the healing and damage you create through them. Whenever you cast a spell using your alchemistâ€™s supplies as the spellcasting focus, you gain a bonus to one roll of the spell. That roll must restore hit points or be a damage roll that deals acid or poison damage, and the bonus equals your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1)."

Quote from Eberron -Rising from the Last War: "At 5th level, you develop masterful command of magical
chemicals, enhancing the healing and damage you create through them. Whenever you cast a spell using your
alchemist's supplies as the spellcasting focus, you gain
a bonus to one roll of the spell. That roll must restore hit
points or be a damage roll that deals acid, fire, necrotic,
or poison damage, and the bonus equals your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1). "

It says I am not able to edit the page, could someone give me a hand? It omits 2 damage types from the original (fire and necrotic)
